text: Beverly Hills Cop is a 2006 first-person shooter video game based on the movie series with the same name that came out for the PlayStation 2. It was developed by Atomic Planet Entertainment, published by Blast Entertainment and only came out in Europe. ==Reception== The game was widely panned by critics. *Jeff Gerstmann of Giant Bomb said Beverly Hills Cop is "the 9/11 of video games". *The game is #2 on Zach Ames of smosh.com's list "5 Video Games Based On Movies That Make No Sense". He did not like Eddie Murphy's likeness was not used for Axel Foley. ==References== Category:2006 video games Category:First- person shooters Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Beverly Hills Cop
title: Beverly Hills Cop (2006 video game)
